title: Tech Stories of 2019 - The Bummer Episode
itunes:title: Tech Stories of 2019 - The Bummer Episode
description:
Jonathan looks back at some of the biggest (and saddest) tech stories of 2019. From bankruptcies to data breaches, this one is kind of a bummer, but still important!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
